amendatorysection.catchline: Site and Building Development Fund; use; eligible activities.
amendatorysection.para: The Department of Economic Development shall use the Site and Building Development Fund to finance loans, grants, subsidies, credit enhancements, and other financial assistance for industrial site and building development and for expenses of the department as appropriated by the Legislature for administering the fund. The following activities are eligible for assistance from the fund:
(1) Grants or zero-interest loans to villages, cities, or counties to acquire land, infuse infrastructure, or otherwise make large sites and buildings ready for industrial development;
(2) Matching funds for new construction, rehabilitation, or acquisition of land and buildings to assist villages, cities, and counties;
(5) Projects making industrial-ready sites and buildings more accessible to business and industry; and
(6) Infrastructure projects necessary for the development of industrial-ready sites and buildings.
